name: Pipes (itch) (Lebuh)
description:
A little game test for an upcoming game I'm working on. More to come on that, but keep your eyes peeled for more minigames!

Keyboard Controls:

Arrow Keys, WASD, NumPad 2468 - Directional Pad (Movement)

Space, z, alt, j, NumPad 0 - A

X, ctrl, k, NumPad + - B

Enter, Escape - Start

Made in GB Studio

https://discord.gg/725tbcX24f Join here for more updates and to ask any questions directly :D
